The documentated page. 
public interface Shell
{
    public abstract void exec(String prompt,
                              TopLevelForm form)
      throws zeta.session.Failures.FormFailed;
    public abstract void notifyFormRegister(TopLevelForm form);
    public abstract void notifyFormUnregister(TopLevelForm form);
}
